sources.title: Barnyard Babies (1940)
sources.description: Mother Hen's kids are aspiring singers and actresses, but Chester wants to become a G-Man. This fantasy of his lands him into trouble. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/barnyard-babies-1940/

metadata.Plot: In a chicken coop, mama is knitting while her daughters talk about how they want to be dancers and singers. In comes the one adolescent rooster wants to grow up to be a G-Man. They all laugh, but a fox tells him he'll take him down to G-Man headquarters.It's one of those listen-to-mama cartoons that annoy me, ad the rustic setting is also something I don't usually care for, but there's lots of amusingly indicated violence that appeals to the small boy with me.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Danny Webb, Robert Winkler
